      Creates a new transient (not yet saved in DB) booking object, but with a promo code code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Booking

        public Booking()

      • Booking

        public Booking(Customer customer,
               Offering offering,
               int numAdults,
               int numChildren,
               int numToddlers,
               double amountPaid,
               java.lang.String specialRequests,
               java.lang.String paymentStatus)
        Creates a new transient (not yet saved in DB) booking object without a promo code.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer making the booking
        offering - The offering to book
        numAdults - How many adults in the booking
        numChildren - How many children in the booking
        numToddlers - How many toddlers in the booking
        amountPaid - How much the customer has already paid
        specialRequests - Special requests
        paymentStatus - The payment status. Can be PAYMENT_PENDING, PAYMENT_CONFIRMED, or PAYMENT_CANCELLED_BECAUSE_OFFERING_CANCELLED

      • Booking

        public Booking(Customer customer,
               Offering offering,
               int numAdults,
               int numChildren,
               int numToddlers,
               double amountPaid,
               java.lang.String specialRequests,
               java.lang.String paymentStatus,
               double promoDiscountMultiplier,
               java.lang.String promoCodeUsed)
        Creates a new transient (not yet saved in DB) booking object, but with a promo code code.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer making the booking
        offering - The offering to book
        numAdults - How many adults in the booking
        numChildren - How many children in the booking
        numToddlers - How many toddlers in the booking
        amountPaid - How much the customer has already paid
        specialRequests - Special requests
        paymentStatus - The payment status. Can be PAYMENT_PENDING, PAYMENT_CONFIRMED, or PAYMENT_CANCELLED_BECAUSE_OFFERING_CANCELLED
        promoDiscountMultiplier - The discount provided by the promotion; a double between [0, 1]. E.g. 0.7 indicates 30% off the final price.
        promoCodeUsed - The actual promo code.

      • getTotalCost

        public double getTotalCost()
        Returns:
        The dollar cost of this booking record. Depends on if it's weekday/weekend, the number of adults, children, toddlers, child discount, and toddler discount. Will also apply the promotional discount, if applicable.

      • getAmountPaid

        public double getAmountPaid()
        Returns:
        The dollar amount that's already been paid by the customer

      • getPromoDiscountMultiplier

        public double getPromoDiscountMultiplier()
        Returns:
        Returns a double [0, 1.0] indicating the discount multiplier. E.g. 0.7 means a 30% discount.

      • setPromoDiscountMultiplier

        public void setPromoDiscountMultiplier(double promoDiscountMultiplier)
        Parameters:
        promoDiscountMultiplier - A double between [0, 1.0] indicating the discount multiplier. 1.0 for full price (no discount).
